commitMessage:
@@@3.x: Refactor to io.reactivex.rxjava3.** (#6621)

* 3.x: Refactor to io.reactivex.rxjava3.**

* fix javadoc cleanup gradle

* javadoc gradle again

* Fix package location in text

@@@3.x: Add missing annotations.  fix many diamonds (#6795)

* 3.x: Add missing annotations.  fix many diamonds

* Fix accidental JDK 9 API usage

* Fix NPE in unicast due to null-cleanup

@@@3.x: Improve JavaDocs of Observable and fix similar issues elsewhere (#6831)

* 3.x: Javadoc cleanup of Observable

* Another set of cleanups (too many things to fix at once)

* 3.x: Improve JavaDocs of Observable and fix similar issues elsewhere

@@@3.x: Move nullability annotations into the type argument declaration (#7303)

* 3.x: Move nullability annotations into the type argument declaration

* Reinforce Function<T.  R> return argument type where R is non-trivial
